statement.name: INSERT_SMAELM
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smaelm( codelm, tipelm, nroelm, nomelm, dspelm, nvlprs, valelm, memelm, swhelm, ideelm) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAELM
statement.sql: UPDATE smaelm SET nomelm=?, dspelm=?, nvlprs=?, valelm=?, memelm=?, swhelm=? WHERE codelm=? AND tipelm=? AND nroelm=? and ideelm=?

statement.name: DELETE_SMAELM
statement.sql: DELETE FROM smaelm WHERE codelm=? AND tipelm=? AND nroelm=?
